node.title: Britney Spears speaks out on her new-found freedom, advocates for those under legal control
node.description: Britney Spears speaks out on new-found freedoms following her release from a strict legal guardianship that controlled her life for 13 years. Spears says she will be an advocate for those living under conservatorships, and tags Oprah.
node.content:
["Britney Spears has spoken out on her new-found\u00a0freedoms following her release\u00a0from a strict legal guardianship which\u00a0controlled her life for 13 years.", "In one of her most detailed statements outside of a courtroom since the rise of the #FreeBritney movement, Spears said she would be an advocate for the estimated 1.3 million Americans living under the legal arrangements.", "She also credited her fans with saving her life, and hinted that she might be open to an interview with Oprah Winfrey.", "The pop star began her message on social media by describing how\u00a0much she appreciated her freedom from the conservatorship.", "\"I've been in the conservatorship for 13 years,\" she said.", "\"It's a really long time to be in a situation you don't want to be in.", "\"I'm just grateful honestly for each day.\"", "She said it was \"little things\" she was now able to do that had improved her life.", "\"Being able to have the keys to my car, to be able to be independent and feel like a woman.", "\"Owning an ATM card, seeing cash for the first time, being able to buy candles. It's the little things\u00a0for us women\u00a0but it makes a huge difference. \"", "\"I'm grateful for that. It's nice, it's really nice.\"", "
Changing a 'corrupt system'
", "Spears said she would be an advocate for people living under the same legal arrangement she lived under following a mental breakdown in 2008.", "Depending on the terms of legal conservatorship,\u00a0guardians can wield enormous control over those living under them. Advocates have\u00a0likened the arrangements to a legal Wild West.\u00a0", "Until recently,\u00a0all of her financial and personal affairs had been\u00a0managed by her father, Jamie Spears, who had an overwhelming\u00a0say in his daughter's choices for 13 years.\u00a0", "One of the most shocking parts of Spears's testimony to a Los Angeles court in June was that she wasn't allowed to get her contraceptive device removed so she could try to fall pregnant.", "At the time, she\u00a0described the restrictions as \"abusive\" and said, \"I just want my life back.\"", "\"I'm here to be an advocate for people with real disabilities and real illnesses,\" Spears said in the video posted to her social media channels.", "\"I'm a very strong woman, so I can only imagine what the system has done to those people.", "\"So hopefully my story will make an impact and make some changes in the corrupt system.\"\u00a0", "In October, Spears's lawyer\u00a0Matthew Rosengart\u00a0vowed to pursue an investigation of Mr Spears\u00a0and his handling of the conservatorship.\u00a0", "
Thanking fans ... and how does\u00a0Oprah fit in?
", "Spears\u00a0again thanked fans who advocated for her release\u00a0and credited them with saving her life.", "\"The Free Britney movement, you guys rock, my voice was so muted and threatened for so long and I wasn't able to speak up or say anything,\" she said.", "\"Because of you guys honestly I think you saved my life in a way.\"", "", "
Oprah Winfrey interviewed\u00a0Prince Harry and Meghan, Duchess of Sussex earlier this year and Adele this week.(CBS)
", "She also hinted at a potential interview with Oprah Winfrey by tagging the American television host, famous\u00a0for blockbuster\u00a0interviews that attract global attention, on Twitter.\u00a0", "Although, Spears included\u00a0thinking, joking and shrugging emojis in the post."]
